author: striker
msg: Fix issue #1949: mod_authz_svn: a writer can circumvent unreadable subtrees.
to be able to be used for parsing sections aswell.
(parse_authz_line, parse_authz_lines): Update to use new baton name.
(parse_authz_section): New function to determine whether access to a
(parse_authz_sections): New function.  Visits all sections until a
section is encountered that restricts access given a user/path
(check_access): Update to use parse_authz_sections, if required.
(req_check_access): Update access requirements per HTTP method.
Specifically adds the requirement of checking subtrees to the mix.

author: clkao
msg: Get rid of the Internals requirement incidentally committed.

author: rey4
msg: Windows build cleanup. Reorganize code that generates swig command
clean up, get rid of some duplicate logic

author: breser
msg: Fix perl test suite to work with new the changes to svn_path_canonicalize().
Don't put 4 slashes in a file URL when on Unix.

author: breser
msg: Build generator fix. Make install targets in generated makefile have
explicit dependencies on library install targets. So for example,
make the "install-bin" target depend on the "install-lib"
target because one or more of the installed files in "install-bin"
depends on one or more libraries installed by "install-lib"
